text: sis - Hypergonadotropic hypogonadism - Hyporeflexia - Impaired distal proprioception - Impaired distal vibration sensation - Increased serum lactate - Increased variability in muscle fiber diameter - Limb muscle weakness - Multiple mitochondrial DNA deletions - Muscle fiber necrosis - Parkinsonism with favorable response to dopaminergic medication - Pes cavus - Phenotypic variability - Premature ovarian failure - Primary amenorrhea - Progressive - Progressive external ophthalmoplegia - Progressi
